{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Buffalo |model=WZR-900D |revision=HP |series=N900 |asin=B00BHP2R4O |fcc_date=05/14/2013 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Arcadyan |manuf_model=WG9116H |manuf_rev=33 |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=FDI000000014 |ic_id=6102A-049 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM47081A0;BCM47081A0KFEBG; |cpu1_cspeed=800 |cpu1_cores=1 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Zentel |fla1_model=A5U1GA31ATS-BC |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B2G1646E-BCK0 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4331 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4331 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz High Power Wireless LAN Power Amplifier;Skyworks (SiGe);SE2605L;;3; ,,, 5GHz 26dBm Power Amplifier With Power Detector;Skyworks (SiGe);SE5004L;;3; |flags= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=10:6F:3F,B0:C7:45, |oui_eth=10:6F:3F,B0:C7:45, }} {{TagLine|Buffalo AirStation N900 Gigabit DualBand Wireless Router}} :[https://www.buffalo.jp/product/detail/wzr-900dhp.html Product page] (JP)
*[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=746456 Stub post on the DD-WRT forums]
The ''[[Arcadyan]]'' model on the label appears to be [https://memo205.wordpress.com/category/router/broadcom/ WG9116H33]. :A MAC address with a 10:6F:3F OUI is also on the label. :This is presumed to be an OUI used by this device.
Additional info, per the FCC internal photos... *CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM47081A0 SoC's full P/N is BCM47081A0KFEBG. *5GHz radio: 3x [[Skyworks]] (''SiGe'') [http://www.skyworksinc.com/Product/970/SE5004L SE5004L] Power Amplifier Module. *2.4GHz radio: 3x [[Skyworks]] (''SiGe'') [http://www.skyworksinc.com/Product/964/SE2605L SE2605L] ([http://phx.corporate-ir.net/phoenix.zhtml?c=131895&p=irol-newsArticle&ID=1700613 SE2504L]) PAM. *All antennas shown are ''Airgain'' antennas: :N5x20B for 5GHz, N2420SS for 2.4GHz.
===See also=== *[[Buffalo WZR-600DHP2]] • [[Arcadyan]] WG9116H22 (BCM47081A0) *[[Buffalo WZR-900DHP]] • [[Arcadyan]] WG9116H33 (BCM47081A0) *[[Buffalo WZR-1750DHP]] • [[Arcadyan]] WG9117GAC33 (BCM4708A0) *[[Buffalo WZR-1166DHP]] • [[Arcadyan]] WG9117EAC22 (BCM4708A0) *[[Buffalo WZR-D1800H]] • [[Arcadyan]] WA9116BAC33 (BCM4706) <!-- :wzr-600dhp2 • FLA1: 128MB (Zentel A5U1GA31ATS-BC) cpu BCM47081A0 :wzr-900dhp • FLA1: 128MB (Zentel A5U1GA31ATS-BC) cpu BCM47081A0 :wzr-1750dhp • FLA1: 128MB (Zentel A5U1GA31ATS-BC) cpu BCM4708A0 :wzr-1166dhp • FLA1: 128MB (Samsung K9F1G08U0D-SCB0) cpu BCM4708A0 :wzr-d1800h • FLA1: 128MB (Samsung K9F1G08U0D-SCB0) cpu BCM4706 -->
